text: Thief's Challenge is an adventure for the 2nd edition of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game, published in 1993. ==Contents== The Thief's Challenge is a single player module for thief characters that are between levels 1 and 4. ==Publication history== ==Reception== ==Reviews== *White Wolf #42 ==References== Category:Dungeons & Dragons modules
title: Thief's Challenge
